FuncDef:
The ds-lite ipv4 portal enable command enables a device to push advertisements on a portal web page in a DS-Lite scenario.
The undo ds-lite ipv4 portal enable command disables a device from pushing advertisements on a portal web page in a DS-Lite scenario.
By default, a device is disabled from pushing advertisements on a portal web page in a DS-Lite scenario.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to push advertisements on a portal web page in a DS-Lite scenario, run the ds-lite ipv4 portal enable command.
Prerequisites
An AAA domain has been configured.
Configuration Impact
When a user is getting online or CoA switching is performed, packets are sent on a DS-Lite tunnel, which triggers the advertisement pushing.
